titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-700, by Mr. Cole (OK).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 242.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1053.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 1053.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215 - 197 (Roll no. 506).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 193 (Roll no. 507).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/29/2006--Passed House without amendment. Waives a specified requirement of Rule XIII (Calendars and Committee Reports) to allow any resolution reported from the Committee on Rules on the legislative day of September 29 to be considered on the same day it is presented to the House.
